U

unregisterUser(String) - Method in class library.service.UserService
Unregisters a user from the system after validating all business rules.
User - Class in library.domain
Represents a library user who can borrow books and CDs.
User(String, String) - Constructor for class library.domain.User
Constructs a new user with a name and unique ID.
userHasAnyOverdue(User) - Method in class library.service.LoanService
Checks whether a user has any overdue items (books or CDs).
UserRepository - Class in library.repository
Repository responsible for managing user records in the library system.
UserRepository() - Constructor for class library.repository.UserRepository
 
UserService - Class in library.service
Service responsible for managing user-related operations such as: Unregistering users (Sprint 4 requirement) Checking borrowing restrictions related to user accounts The UserService enforces all business rules associated with unregistration, including admin authentication, active loan checks, and fine balance validation.
UserService(UserRepository, LoanRepository, AdminService) - Constructor for class library.service.UserService
Constructs a UserService with required repositories and admin service.
